parameters.command: =ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.18 "if [ ! -s /context/hot_topics.md ]; then echo '# Hot Topics' > /context/hot_topics.md; echo '' >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo 'Leadership concerns, themes, and priorities.' >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo '' >> /context/hot_topics.md; fi; echo '- **{{ $json.dateStr }}:** {{ $json.description }}' >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo 'SUCCESS'"

=ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.18 "if [ -f /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md ]; then echo 'ERROR: Brief already exists'; exit 1; fi; cat > /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md << 'EOF'
# Project: {{ $json.projectName }}

**Status:** Active
**Last Updated:** {{ $json.dateStr }}

## Summary
{{ $json.content || 'TODO: Add summary' }}

## My Role
TODO: Define role

## Key Stakeholders
TODO: List stakeholders

## Current Phase
TODO: Describe current phase

## Open Questions / Blockers
TODO: List questions

## Leadership Visibility
TODO: Describe visibility
EOF
chmod 644 /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md; echo 'SUCCESS'"
